name: Covalent Works EDI Software
overview:
CovalentWorks provides EDI software solutions for small business.

EDI stands for electronic data interchange, a required software solution for working with many business partners.

CovalentWorks EDI software solutions provide a simple interface that makes implementation and use of EDI software as easy as email.

CovalentWorks EDI software solutions translate your transaction information into the format your partner requires, be it purchase orders, acknowledgements, advanced shipping notices, invoices, payment advices, requests for quotes and any other transactions.

Outsourcing your EDI solutions software needs is less expensive, faster and doesn’t require additional hardware, personnel, set up, testing and maintenance.
